data.text:
The day before the Selection Race was to be 
held I decided to go for a walk in a nearby park.
data.processed:
<story>The day before the Selection Race was to be 
<story>held I decided to go for a walk in a nearby park.

data.text:
Woah woah woah! 
Move! Move outta the way!!
data.name: Tokai Teio
data.processed:
<story>Woah woah woah! 
<story>Move! Move outta the way!!

data.text: Whoo!!
data.name: Tokai Teio
data.processed: <story>Whoo!!

data.text: *Jump!*
data.processed: <story>*Jump!*

data.text:
I looked over and saw Tokai Teio running towards 
me, but at the last second she jumped over me in 
a beautiful manner. Then…
data.processed:
<story>I looked over and saw Tokai Teio running towards 
<story>me, but at the last second she jumped over me in 
<story>a beautiful manner. Then…

data.text: And safe!! Now then… here's your hat!
data.name: Tokai Teio
data.processed: <story>And safe!! Now then… here's your hat!

data.text:
It seems like that little girl's hat got stuck 
up a tree and Tokai Teio went and got it for her…
data.processed:
<story>It seems like that little girl's hat got stuck 
<story>up a tree and Tokai Teio went and got it for her…

data.text:
Waah! Thank you so much, Miss! That jump was 
super cool too!!
data.name: Girl A
data.processed:
<story>Waah! Thank you so much, Miss! That jump was 
<story>super cool too!!

data.text:
No no no. Don't call me "Miss" call me the 
"Unbeatable Teio-sama"♪
data.name: Tokai Teio
data.processed:
<story>No no no. Don't call me "Miss" call me the 
<story>"Unbeatable Teio-sama"♪

data.text:
Unbeatable…? I don't really 
get it, but it sounds cool!
data.name: Girl A
data.processed:
<story>Unbeatable…? I don't really 
<story>get it, but it sounds cool!

data.text: Wahahaha!! Feel free to praise me more!!
data.name: Tokai Teio
data.processed: <story>Wahahaha!! Feel free to praise me more!!

data.text:
Oh, that's right… Hey you! Sorry 
for scaring you like that.
data.name: Tokai Teio
data.processed:
<story>Oh, that's right… Hey you! Sorry 
<story>for scaring you like that.

data.text:
I couldn't hit the brakes and ended up jumping 
over you! You're not hurt anywhere, are you?
data.name: Tokai Teio

choices.text: More importantly, are you okay? That landing must've…
choices.processed: <size=29>More importantly, are you okay? That landing must've…</size>

choices.text: More importantly, are you okay? That landing must've…
choices.processed: <size=29>More importantly, are you okay? That landing must've…</size>

data.processed:
<story>I couldn't hit the brakes and ended up jumping 
<story>over you! You're not hurt anywhere, are you?

data.text:
Aha! That was nothing for someone like me! See? 
I feel perfect!
data.name: Tokai Teio
data.processed:
<story>Aha! That was nothing for someone like me! See? 
<story>I feel perfect!

data.text:
Even though she jumped so high, Tokai Teio 
seemed completely fine.
data.processed:
<story>Even though she jumped so high, Tokai Teio 
<story>seemed completely fine.

data.text:
It seems like she's truly blessed 
with an amazing physique, as evidenced 
by that amazing leap she had!
data.processed:
<story>It seems like she's truly blessed 
<story>with an amazing physique, as evidenced 
<story>by that amazing leap she had!

data.text: Were you surprised? I bet you were! Hehe♪
data.name: Tokai Teio
data.processed: <story>Were you surprised? I bet you were! Hehe♪

data.text:
Wait, I'm busy right now! I was in the middle of 
running. So see ya later!
data.name: Tokai Teio
data.processed:
<story>Wait, I'm busy right now! I was in the middle of 
<story>running. So see ya later!

data.text: After saying that, Tokai Teio nimbly ran off.
data.processed: <story>After saying that, Tokai Teio nimbly ran off.

data.text:
For the rest of the day, I couldn't get her out 
of my mind. Then came the Selection Race…
data.processed:
<story>For the rest of the day, I couldn't get her out 
<story>of my mind. Then came the Selection Race…

data.text:
You're doing great, Teio!! Continue this pace 
and overtake the rest of 'em!!
data.name: Crowd
data.processed:
<story>You're doing great, Teio!! Continue this pace 
<story>and overtake the rest of 'em!!

data.text:
Tokai Teio is steadily increasing her position! 
She's pushing gracefully into the lead!
data.name: Commentator
data.processed:
<story>Tokai Teio is steadily increasing her position! 
<story>She's pushing gracefully into the lead!

data.text: Hehe… The winner's gonna be me!!
data.name: Tokai Teio
data.processed: <story>Hehe… The winner's gonna be me!!

data.text:
Tokai Teio is extending her lead!! 
No one can catch up with her as she 
proceeds forward with ease!!
data.name: Commentator
data.processed:
<story>Tokai Teio is extending her lead!! 
<story>No one can catch up with her as she 
<story>proceeds forward with ease!!

data.text:
She's four lengths ahead of 2nd place, and 
she's the winner!! The winner of this Selection 
Race is Tokai Teio! This was a beautiful 
display of her strength!!
data.name: Commentator
data.processed:
<story>She's four lengths ahead of 2nd place, and 
<story>she's the winner!! The winner of this Selection 
<story>Race is Tokai Teio! This was a beautiful 
<story>display of her strength!!

data.text: Phew! Everyone! How'd you like that race!?
data.name: Tokai Teio
data.processed: <story>Phew! Everyone! How'd you like that race!?

data.text: Teio, you're the best!!
data.name: Spectator A
data.processed: <story>Teio, you're the best!!

data.text: You looked amazing out there!!
data.name: Spectator B
data.processed: <story>You looked amazing out there!!

data.text:
Aha, thanks! But hey, of course I of all people 
was able to do it!!
data.name: Tokai Teio
data.processed:
<story>Aha, thanks! But hey, of course I of all people 
<story>was able to do it!!

data.text:
Eh? Who're… Ah! You were at the park yesterday! 
Hmm… why're you here?
data.name: Tokai Teio
data.processed:
<story>Eh? Who're… Ah! You were at the park yesterday! 
<story>Hmm… why're you here?

data.text:
Ah, I get it! You're a trainer, aren't you!? Now 
that I take a closer look, you've got a badge 
and everything!!
data.name: Tokai Teio
data.processed:
<story>Ah, I get it! You're a trainer, aren't you!? Now 
<story>that I take a closer look, you've got a badge 
<story>and everything!!

data.text:
So the reason you're coming to talk to me is… 
You're trying to scout me, aren't you!?
data.name: Tokai Teio

choices.text: I'd love to be your trainer!
I'd love to be your trainer!

data.processed:
<story>So the reason you're coming to talk to me is… 
<story>You're trying to scout me, aren't you!?

data.text:
Ehehe, what should I do? The thing 
is, even before this race a lot of 
trainers reached out to me.
data.name: Tokai Teio
data.processed:
<story>Ehehe, what should I do? The thing 
<story>is, even before this race a lot of 
<story>trainers reached out to me.

data.text:
Ah! There she is, Tokai Teio!! Your 
racing ability was truly spectacular! 
Please allow me to scout you!!
data.name: Rookie Trainer A
data.processed:
<story>Ah! There she is, Tokai Teio!! Your 
<story>racing ability was truly spectacular! 
<story>Please allow me to scout you!!

data.text:
Teio, join me! I'm sure that if we work together 
you'll not only be able to win GI races, but 
also the Triple Crown!
data.name: Veteran Trainer A
data.processed:
<story>Teio, join me! I'm sure that if we work together 
<story>you'll not only be able to win GI races, but 
<story>also the Triple Crown!

data.text:
Oh no, they keep increasing!! Umm, if this many 
people approach me I won't be able to decide…
data.name: Tokai Teio
data.processed:
<story>Oh no, they keep increasing!! Umm, if this many 
<story>people approach me I won't be able to decide…

data.text:
Well regardless of who I choose, I'll be the one 
running so nothing's really gonna change.
data.name: Tokai Teio
data.processed:
<story>Well regardless of who I choose, I'll be the one 
<story>running so nothing's really gonna change.

data.text:
Guess whoever beats me at rock-paper-scissors 
gets to be my trainer!
data.name: Tokai Teio
data.processed:
<story>Guess whoever beats me at rock-paper-scissors 
<story>gets to be my trainer!

data.text:
Come on now, Teio. An Uma Musume and her trainer 
must work together in perfect harmony…
data.name: Symboli Rudolf
data.processed:
<story>Come on now, Teio. An Uma Musume and her trainer 
<story>must work together in perfect harmony…

data.text: Ahh, Prez!! Preeezz!!
data.name: Tokai Teio
data.processed: <story>Ahh, Prez!! Preeezz!!

data.text:
You came to watch my race, didn't you!? Hehehe, 
how did I do!? I won again ya know?!
data.name: Tokai Teio
data.processed:
<story>You came to watch my race, didn't you!? Hehehe, 
<story>how did I do!? I won again ya know?!

data.text:
Haa… Yes, I did come to watch. You did 
amazingly, as usual.
data.name: Symboli Rudolf
data.processed:
<story>Haa… Yes, I did come to watch. You did 
<story>amazingly, as usual.

data.text:
Yaay!! Ehehe, Prez praised me♪ 
Everyone, did you hear that!?
data.name: Tokai Teio
data.processed:
<story>Yaay!! Ehehe, Prez praised me♪ 
<story>Everyone, did you hear that!?

data.text:
Eh? Ah, yeah… But more importantly 
than that, I would like to…
data.name: Rookie Trainer A
data.processed:
<story>Eh? Ah, yeah… But more importantly 
<story>than that, I would like to…

data.text:
What did you just say!? What do you mean by 
"that!?" Hey you, do you not understand just how 
amazing Prez really is!?
data.name: Tokai Teio
data.processed:
<story>What did you just say!? What do you mean by 
<story>"that!?" Hey you, do you not understand just how 
<story>amazing Prez really is!?

data.text:
She's the president of Tracen Academy, you 
know!? She's also super fast, super strong, and 
super cool! She's the greatest Uma Musume in the 
world, and my idol!!
data.name: Tokai Teio
data.processed:
<story>She's the president of Tracen Academy, you 
<story>know!? She's also super fast, super strong, and 
<story>super cool! She's the greatest Uma Musume in the 
<story>world, and my idol!!

data.text:
One day I'm gonna be as great as her, then 
she'll praise me a whole bunch♪
data.name: Tokai Teio
data.processed:
<story>One day I'm gonna be as great as her, then 
<story>she'll praise me a whole bunch♪

data.text:
And that means that if you really wanna 
scout me, you've gotta truly understand 
just how great Prez is!
data.name: Tokai Teio
data.processed:
<story>And that means that if you really wanna 
<story>scout me, you've gotta truly understand 
<story>just how great Prez is!

data.text:
Speaking of… Did you all see her debut 
race!? Prez was so amazing, starting 
from the first corner she…!
data.name: Tokai Teio
data.processed:
<story>Speaking of… Did you all see her debut 
<story>race!? Prez was so amazing, starting 
<story>from the first corner she…!

data.text:
All of the trainers that came to speak with 
Tokai Teio ended up getting lectured on the 
legendary history of "Prez…"
data.processed:
<story>All of the trainers that came to speak with 
<story>Tokai Teio ended up getting lectured on the 
<story>legendary history of "Prez…"

data.text:
In the end, no one was able to 
talk to her about scouting…
data.processed:
<story>In the end, no one was able to 
<story>talk to her about scouting…
